title: Manca un mese all'Odissea!

embed.description: Join Mario on a massive, globe-trotting 3D adventure! Use his incredible new abilities to collect Moons that power up your airship- the Odyssey, and rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's wedding plans! Super Mario Odyssey launches to Nintendo Switch on October 27, 2017. Learn more about Super Mario Odyssey!

body:
GNE GNE GNE
MA I GIOCHI DI MARIO SONO TUTTI UGUALI
MAI VARIETA', SEMPRE LA STESSA FORMULA
GNE GNE GNE

Annunciano Odyssey e tutti zitti. :^)
